racesArr.name: Nord
racesArr.desc: Nords in Skyrim are hardy, resilient warriors from the cold northern lands, renowned for their bravery, honor, and natural resistance to frost.

racesArr.name: Orc
racesArr.desc: Orcs are a proud and formidable race known for their physical strength, warrior culture, and craftsmanship, particularly in forging powerful Orcish weapons and armor.

racesArr.name: High Elf
racesArr.desc: High Elves, or Altmer, are a highly intelligent and magically gifted race, hailing from the Summerset Isles, often seen as proud or aloof due to their long lifespans and advanced mastery of arcane arts.

racesArr.name: Khajiit
racesArr.desc: Khajiit are a feline race from Elsweyr, known for their agility, stealth, and natural aptitude for thievery, often excelling as thieves, assassins, or traders.
